author: The Hindu
title: COVID-19 lockdown: Poem
description: Stay safeDon’t take risk,Please put mask.Don’t go in flight,Washing hands is right.Stay safe at home,Otherwise it will harm.Don’t mingle,Always be single.When carelessness increases,Population decreas
content:
Stay safe
Dont take risk,
Please put mask.
Dont go in flight,
Washing hands is right.
Stay safe at home,
Otherwise it will harm.
Dont mingle,
Always be single.
When carelessness increases,
Population decreases.
Isolation is the only way,
To fight … [+90 chars]
